properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 5 at 11:41PM MST until January 8 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 15 inches by
Wednesday morning. The period of most intense snow fall is
expected Monday afternoon and evening.

* WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley
Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth.

* WHEN...From 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening to 5 AM MST /4 AM
PST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY
